name: Gaullie's Peace
description:
Gaullie's Peace
 To appreciate the games colors, please click the expand icon in the corner of the viewer.

Controls : 

Arrow Keys to move,

Arrow keys to interact.

Gaullie's Peace was made in a day using Bitsy game maker. 


Please leave a comment to share your thoughts and experience.


If you liked this game please follow this account and check out our other releases, future releases
